thread.section_title: Ibis London Euston St Pancras - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent Value for Money
thread.title_full: Excellent Value for Money - Review of Ibis London Euston St Pancras, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Jo H
title: Excellent Value for Money
text: I have stayed at this hotel on a couple of occasions and find that it is excellent value for money. The hotel is right at the side of Euston station. The rooms are plenty big enough for two. The breakfast is all you can eat with plenty of choice. We also had a meal in the hotel a couple of times and we weren't disappointed.
